comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps the "Rt Rev. Dr. Arthur S. Lloyd, President of the Board of Missions" for the Episcopal Church. See NYT of Oct 11, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9503E1DE133FE633A... and www.johnsmemorial.org/rectors.htm indicates his middle name was Selden

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: anglicanhistory.org/usa/aslloyd/ has another picture of him. Looks the same to me.

comment._content: Yes, swanq, I agree.  We'll fill in the name the next time we update the record.  Thanks for providing the links.
